name: Agami - A Colorful Adventure
description:
Agami:

A color based puzzle game where colors take front stage. The goal of the game is to solve all of the puzzles and obstacles presented in the game, while also using the colors to help guide the player through the world. This game was created in less than 48 hours for the Game Maker's tool kit jam. Solving all of the puzzles is the only escape from this color filled cosmos.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Swap colors - Q and E

Interact - Mouse

Game Maker's tool kit jam:

The first GMTK jam's theme - dual purpose design. This game's main dual purpose entity - color palette swap, which let's colors not only make a level look a different way, but also change the level's core geometry while being the foreground for a lot of in-game puzzles. Colors coupled with other game entities make the game beautiful and calming to play.

Tools used:

Music & Sound - FL Studio 11

Game Engine - Unity 2017.01

Textures & Sprites - Photoshop CC

Models - Blender & MagicaVoxel

Creator:

Gamejam participant Tadas Knieza
